modulesToDelete.title: Supervised Learning
modulesToDelete.reason: Module has no defined skills, indicating it is incomplete or poorly structured and does not contribute specific, measurable learning outcomes.

modulesToAdd.title: Python for Data Science & ML
modulesToAdd.reason: Foundational programming and data manipulation skills are critical and frequently requested in job postings, currently missing from the curriculum.

modulesToAdd.title: Data Preprocessing & Feature Engineering
modulesToAdd.reason: Essential skills for preparing data for machine learning models, highly prevalent in job market and trending skills.

modulesToAdd.title: Practical Machine Learning with Scikit-learn
modulesToAdd.reason: Scikit-learn is a standard library for practical ML, and unsupervised learning is a key paradigm missing from the curriculum.

modulesToAdd.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals & Frameworks
modulesToAdd.reason: Deep learning is a core component of modern AI engineering roles, with specific frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow being highly demanded.

modulesToAdd.title: Model Deployment & MLOps
modulesToAdd.reason: Skills related to deploying and managing ML models in production are crucial for AI engineers and are trending in the job market.

modulesToAdd.title: Advanced AI: NLP & Computer Vision
modulesToAdd.reason: Specialized AI domains like NLP and Computer Vision, along with their associated tools and libraries, are high-demand trending skills.
